Attributes.description: Using the Darwinian theory of natural selection to explore explanations of infectious diseases, allergies, cancer, mental illness, and other human diseases. Priority to students in the Integrated Sciences Program.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Third-year standing in the Faculty of Science.)
